Posts.Content: Nov 14, 2017 02:28PM Lorikw wrote: Hi!I have the same question as you! Do we just have our twice yearly mammo's and just wait and cross our fingers the cancer doesn't spread? I have a mammo and oncologist checkup next month so I am going to ask....I will post the answers I get
Posts.Title: Monitoring for recurrence - what do your doctors suggest? mellee gb2115
